subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: While Cleveland Indians closer Joe Borowski had a league-high 45 saves, he also paced the A.L. with 8 blown saves and had a bloated 5.07 E.R.A.
snippet: While Cleveland Indians closer Joe Borowski had a league-high 45 saves, he also paced the A.L. with 8 blown saves and had a bloated 5.07 E.R.A.
